Articles.Content:
Hai!

I'm back after 5 years of not playing KSP.

Time to explode something.
Things have changed a lot. It will be a big adjustment.

Welcome back! like @Vanamonde said, There are a large number of changes. 5 years ago was when I first started playing and the game is very different. 

Some of the main changes are science, career, communications, aerodynamics, reentry heat, and a bunch of quality of life improvements.

KSP today is entirely different from 2012 KSP. You will likely stumble upon lots of suprises! Even the mods have changed. Back in 2012, a mod that allows you to make and change planets was unheard of, but now its super normal to have a planet pack. Graphics mods are also something you might want to look at.

Woah... 2012 puts you between 0.13 and 0.18, which is a wide range of time (0.18 was FIVE years ago? Wow, I'm getting old).

So, here's the main additions:

0.14 - persistence, the tracking station.

0.15 - Planes and the plane hangar. Right click on parts now. Patched conics. Rotate parts with WASDQE.

0.16 - EVA, IVA, 2.5m parts, launch clamps.

0.17 - better IVA's, multiple saves, PLANETS!

0.18 - Docking, MOAR PARTS, probes, maneuver nodes, and much more. Some say that this is the biggest update KSP has ever had.

0.19 - Rovers, facial expressions, and re-entry effects. Also, Linux!

0.20 - Flag planting and dozens of small changes and parts that imporve quality of gameplay.

0.21 - Overhauled space center. Crew management. Overhauled SAS.

0.22 - Career mode, science, biomes, and subassemblies.

0.23 - hybrid jet rocket engine and many smaller things.

0.23.5 - Asteroids and 3.75m parts. Have multiple quicksaves with alt+f5/f9.

0.24 - Money, reputation, and contracts for career mode.

0.25 - Vastly improved spaceplane parts, administration building, and destroyable buildings.

0.90 - VAB/SPH overhaul. Upgradable facilities, Kerbal experience, other stuff.

1.0 - Female Kerbals, mining, fairings, vastly improved aeridynamics, re-entry heat.

1.1 - Port to Unity 5, save upgrader.

1.2 - communications networks and antennas. Other small changes.

1.3 - KSP now comes in 5 languages.

I like it alot! Feels really polished now. Can definitely feel performance upgrade (even though my laptop is hot af and fans run on max speed). The stability wise I think I'm most happy with rockets themselves, they don't just bend anymore, you have to really mess up for that to happen

Steering itself is also much easier with all the help. I have no idea how I was doing manouvers last time I played.

For now I think I'll stick with sandbox, might do campaign at some point though.

https://imgur.com/a/9LxyF

Getting my Mun base started. I kinda no-lifed the game.

No wonder your PFP is from a super old version...

But really, welcome back! And good luck with your Mun base!
